# Version 1.3.0

## Team Agents & Workflow Enhancements

This major release introduces Team Agents, allowing multiple AI agents to collaborate on complex tasks.

### ‚ú® New Features

- **Team Agents**: Create teams of specialized AI agents that work together
- **Agent Delegation**: Agents can now delegate tasks to other specialized agents
- **Workflow Templates**: Pre-built workflow templates for common use cases
- **PPT Generation**: Create PowerPoint presentations directly from AI agents
- **Image Creation Nodes**: New workflow nodes for AI-powered image generation

### üîß Improvements

- Enhanced workflow editor with better node connections
- Improved agent configuration UI
- Better tool calling in team environments
- Optimized agent response times

### üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed agent handoff issues in team scenarios
- Resolved workflow execution order problems
- Fixed UI rendering issues in workflow editor
